    jQuery('#viewNonCompleteSite').click(function(){
      jQuery.cookie('mobilenotice', null, {path:"/", domain:".foxplay.com"});
      if(/..\/(?:index.html)?$/i.test('mx/factual?ref=natgeo&folder=')){
        var urlString = 'mx/home.html';
      }else{
        var urlString = 'mx/factual?ref=natgeo&folder=';
      }      
      location.href="http://m.foxplay.com/"+urlString;
    });

  jQuery("#logout").click(function(){
    userLogout();
    TBX.logout(function(d){
      if(d.status === true)
      {
        document.cookie = "toolbox_user_token=;expires=Thu, 01 Jan 1970 00:00:01 GMT;Path=/;Domain=.foxplay.com";
        location.href = "/";
      }
      else
      {
        openPopup('#modalGeneric', errorTitle, errorText);
      }
    });
  });  
    UserData.on("profileInit,profileLoaded", function(){
      if(UserData.token && UserData.token!=null)
      {
        jQuery("#logout").show();
      }
      else
      {
        jQuery("#logout").hide();
      }
      UserData.printMenuProfile();
    });
  </script><div class="cbpHeader"><div class="barColor"></div><div class="cbpInner"><h1><a href="/mx/"><span id="mainLogo" class="vectors vecLogo"><img alt="" 		listClips();
	});

</a><script type="text/javascript"> 
  
  UserProfile.on("ready", function(){
    
    UserData.on("profileInit,profileLoaded", function(){
      if(!UserData.profile)
      {
        $('#mlist10597add').hide().css("visibility","");
        $('#mlist10597remove').hide().css("visibility","");
      }
      else
      {
        if(UserProfile.getWatchListItemById(10597, "show"))
        {      
          $('#mlist10597add').hide().css("visibility","");
          $('#mlist10597remove').show().css('visibility', 'visible');
        }
        else
        {
          $('#mlist10597add').show().css('visibility', 'visible');
          $('#mlist10597remove').hide().css("visibility","");
        }
      }
    });
  });

  UserProfile.on("ready", function(){
    
    UserData.on("profileInit,profileLoaded", function(){
      if(!UserData.profile)
      {
        $('#mlist7047add').hide().css("visibility","");
        $('#mlist7047remove').hide().css("visibility","");
      }
      else
      {
        if(UserProfile.getWatchListItemById(7047, "show"))
        {      
          $('#mlist7047add').hide().css("visibility","");
          $('#mlist7047remove').show().css('visibility', 'visible');
        }
        else
        {
          $('#mlist7047add').show().css('visibility', 'visible');
          $('#mlist7047remove').hide().css("visibility","");
        }
      }
    });
  });

  UserProfile.on("ready", function(){
    
    UserData.on("profileInit,profileLoaded", function(){
      if(!UserData.profile)
      {
        $('#mlist11169add').hide().css("visibility","");
        $('#mlist11169remove').hide().css("visibility","");
      }
      else
      {
        if(UserProfile.getWatchListItemById(11169, "show"))
        {      
          $('#mlist11169add').hide().css("visibility","");
          $('#mlist11169remove').show().css('visibility', 'visible');
        }
        else
        {
          $('#mlist11169add').show().css('visibility', 'visible');
          $('#mlist11169remove').hide().css("visibility","");
        }
      }
    });
  });

</a><script type="text/javascript"> 
  
  UserProfile.on("ready", function(){
    
    UserData.on("profileInit,profileLoaded", function(){
      if(!UserData.profile)
      {
        $('#mlist8777add').hide().css("visibility","");
        $('#mlist8777remove').hide().css("visibility","");
      }
      else
      {
        if(UserProfile.getWatchListItemById(8777, "show"))
        {      
          $('#mlist8777add').hide().css("visibility","");
          $('#mlist8777remove').show().css('visibility', 'visible');
        }
        else
        {
          $('#mlist8777add').show().css('visibility', 'visible');
          $('#mlist8777remove').hide().css("visibility","");
        }
      }
    });
  });

  UserProfile.on("ready", function(){
    
    UserData.on("profileInit,profileLoaded", function(){
      if(!UserData.profile)
      {
        $('#mlist11533add').hide().css("visibility","");
        $('#mlist11533remove').hide().css("visibility","");
      }
      else
      {
        if(UserProfile.getWatchListItemById(11533, "show"))
        {      
          $('#mlist11533add').hide().css("visibility","");
          $('#mlist11533remove').show().css('visibility', 'visible');
        }
        else
        {
          $('#mlist11533add').show().css('visibility', 'visible');
          $('#mlist11533remove').hide().css("visibility","");
        }
      }
    });
  });

Mi Lista
</a><script type="text/javascript"> 
  
  UserProfile.on("ready", function(){
    
    UserData.on("profileInit,profileLoaded", function(){
      if(!UserData.profile)
      {
        $('#mlist8787add').hide().css("visibility","");
        $('#mlist8787remove').hide().css("visibility","");
      }
      else
      {
        if(UserProfile.getWatchListItemById(8787, "show"))
        {      
          $('#mlist8787add').hide().css("visibility","");
          $('#mlist8787remove').show().css('visibility', 'visible');
        }
        else
        {
          $('#mlist8787add').show().css('visibility', 'visible');
          $('#mlist8787remove').hide().css("visibility","");
        }
      }
    });
  });

Mi Lista
</a><script type="text/javascript"> 
  
  UserProfile.on("ready", function(){
    
    UserData.on("profileInit,profileLoaded", function(){
      if(!UserData.profile)
      {
        $('#mlist7051add').hide().css("visibility","");
        $('#mlist7051remove').hide().css("visibility","");
      }
      else
      {
        if(UserProfile.getWatchListItemById(7051, "show"))
        {      
          $('#mlist7051add').hide().css("visibility","");
          $('#mlist7051remove').show().css('visibility', 'visible');
        }
        else
        {
          $('#mlist7051add').show().css('visibility', 'visible');
          $('#mlist7051remove').hide().css("visibility","");
        }
      }
    });
  });

Mi Lista
</a><script type="text/javascript"> 
  
  UserProfile.on("ready", function(){
    
    UserData.on("profileInit,profileLoaded", function(){
      if(!UserData.profile)
      {
        $('#mlist7157add').hide().css("visibility","");
        $('#mlist7157remove').hide().css("visibility","");
      }
      else
      {
        if(UserProfile.getWatchListItemById(7157, "show"))
        {      
          $('#mlist7157add').hide().css("visibility","");
          $('#mlist7157remove').show().css('visibility', 'visible');
        }
        else
        {
          $('#mlist7157add').show().css('visibility', 'visible');
          $('#mlist7157remove').hide().css("visibility","");
        }
      }
    });
  });

  UserProfile.on("ready", function(){
    
    UserData.on("profileInit,profileLoaded", function(){
      if(!UserData.profile)
      {
        $('#mlist7038add').hide().css("visibility","");
        $('#mlist7038remove').hide().css("visibility","");

      else

        }
        else

  });

</a><script type="text/javascript"> 
  
  UserProfile.on("ready", function(){
    
    UserData.on("profileInit,profileLoaded", function(){
      if(!UserData.profile)
      {
        $('#mlist11167add').hide().css("visibility","");
        $('#mlist11167remove').hide().css("visibility","");
      }
      else
      {
        if(UserProfile.getWatchListItemById(11167, "show"))
        {      
          $('#mlist11167add').hide().css("visibility","");
          $('#mlist11167remove').show().css('visibility', 'visible');
        }
        else
        {
          $('#mlist11167add').show().css('visibility', 'visible');
          $('#mlist11167remove').hide().css("visibility","");
        }
      }
    });
  });

  UserProfile.on("ready", function(){
    
    UserData.on("profileInit,profileLoaded", function(){
      if(!UserData.profile)
      {
        $('#mlist9992add').hide().css("visibility","");
        $('#mlist9992remove').hide().css("visibility","");
      }
      else
      {
        if(UserProfile.getWatchListItemById(9992, "show"))
        {      
          $('#mlist9992add').hide().css("visibility","");
          $('#mlist9992remove').show().css('visibility', 'visible');
        }
        else
        {
          $('#mlist9992add').show().css('visibility', 'visible');
          $('#mlist9992remove').hide().css("visibility","");
        }
      }
    });
  });

  UserProfile.on("ready", function(){
    
    UserData.on("profileInit,profileLoaded", function(){
      if(!UserData.profile)
      {
        $('#mlist11278add').hide().css("visibility","");
        $('#mlist11278remove').hide().css("visibility","");
      }
      else
      {
        if(UserProfile.getWatchListItemById(11278, "show"))
        {      
          $('#mlist11278add').hide().css("visibility","");
          $('#mlist11278remove').show().css('visibility', 'visible');
        }
        else
        {
          $('#mlist11278add').show().css('visibility', 'visible');
          $('#mlist11278remove').hide().css("visibility","");
        }
      }
    });
  });

  // SEARCH INPUT
  jQuery.widget("custom.autocomplete", jQuery.ui.autocomplete, {
    _renderMenu: function (ul, items) {
      var that = this,
          currentCategory = "";
      jQuery.each(items, function (index, item) {
        if (item._type != currentCategory) {
          ul.append("<h3 class='ui-autocomplete-category search_title'>" + (item._type == "serie" ? 'Series TV' : '') + (item._type == "movie" ? 'Peliculas' : '') + (item._type == "live" ? 'Eventos en vivo' : '') + "</h3>");
          currentCategory = item._type;
        }
        that._renderItemData(ul, item);
      });
    }
  });
  
  jQuery(function () {
    
    
    jQuery("[name=fpSearch]").autocomplete({
      appendTo: ".search",
      delay: 0,
      source: function (request, response) {
        jQuery(".ui-autocomplete").addClass("searchLoading");
        jQuery(".ui-autocomplete").empty();
        jQuery(".ui-autocomplete").show();
        jQuery.ajax({
          url: "/mx/ajax/search/json.html",
          type: "get",
          dataType: "json",
          data: {"q": request.term},
          success: function (data) {
            //console.log(data);
            response(jQuery.map(data.hits.hits, function (item) {
              jQuery(".ui-autocomplete").removeClass("searchLoading");
              return item;
            }));
          }
        });
      },
      minLength: 3,
      focus: function (event, ui) {
        event.preventDefault(); // without this: keyboard movements reset the input to ''
        jQuery(this).val(jQuery('.ui-state-focus hgroup h2').html());
      },
      
    }).data('customAutocomplete')._renderItem = function (ul, item) {
      
      var urls = [];
      urls["live"] = "/watch/E";
      urls["movie"] = "/watch/M";
      urls["serie"] = "/show/";



      var str1="-",str2="";
       if (typeof (item._source.genres) != "undefined")
       {
        item._source.genres.forEach(function(entry) { str1=entry.genre.concat("-"); str2=str2.concat(str1);});str2 = str2.substring(0, str2.length - 1);
       }
    
      return $("<li class='" + item._type + "'>")
        .data("ui-autocomplete-item", item)
        .append("<a href='"+urls[item._type]+item._id+"'>" + "<figure class='search_thumb_container'><img src='" + (typeof (item._source.thumbnail) != "undefined" ? '' + item._source.thumbnail + '' : 'http://placehold.it/52x77') + "'/></figure><hgroup><h2>" + (item._type == "live" ? '' + item._source.eventName + '' : '' + item._source.title + '') + '</h2>' + (item._type == "movie" ? '<h3>(' + (typeof (item._source.year) != "undefined" ? '' + item._source.year + '' : '') + ')</h3>' : '') + '<h5>' + (typeof (item._source.genres) != "undefined" ? '' + str2 + '' : '') + '' + (typeof (item._source.genre) != "undefined" ? '' + (item._source.genre).replace('-', ' ') + '' : '') + (typeof (item._source.tuneInDate) != "undefined" ? '' + (item._source.tuneInDate) + '' : '') + (typeof (item._source.tuneInHour) != "undefined" ? ' - ' + (item._source.tuneInHour) + '' : '') + '</h5></hgroup></a>')
        .appendTo(ul);
  
      
    };
    
  }); //End Funcion
  // END - SEARCH INPUT
</script><script>
  jQuery(function() {
    jQuery( ".accordion" ).accordion();
    jQuery( "#accordion" ).accordion();
  });
</script><script>
  jQuery(document).ready(function(){
    
    jQuery('.loupe').click(function(){

      var s = jQuery('.srchBar').val().split(".").join(""); 
      
      if (s.length >= 2){
      	var link = "/mx/search/"+s;
      	document.location.href=link;
      } 
      
    });
    jQuery('.srchBar').keypress(function(e){
      if (e.keyCode == 13) {
        var s = jQuery('.srchBar').val().split(".").join(""); 
        if (s.length >= 2){
        	var link = "/mx/search/"+s;
        	document.location.href=link;	
        }
        return false;
      }
      
    });
    
    if(jQuery.cookie('mobilenotice') == 1){
    	jQuery('.mobile-link').show();
    };
  });
  
</script><div id='div-gpt-ad-1423247898493-0-oop' style='display:none; '><script type='text/javascript'>
  googletag.cmd.push(function() { googletag.display('div-gpt-ad-1423247898493-0-oop'); });
</script></div><script type="text/javascript">if(typeof(positions)!="undefined"&&jQuery.inArray('flyad', positions)>-1)eplAD4M("flyad");</script><script src="http://foxites.github.io/Developers/foxplayla/js/vendor/jquery.raty.js"></script><script type="text/javascript">
  jQuery('div[data-score]').raty({
    score: function() {return $(this).attr('data-score')},
    path: 'http://foxites.github.io/Developers/foxplayla/images/rating/factual',
    half: true
  });
</script><script>
  jQuery("#mainContent .srchBar").keypress(function(event) {
  if ( event.which == 13 ) {
  event.preventDefault();
  }
  });
  jQuery("#mainContent .srchBar").keyup(function () {
filter();
  });
  
  jQuery("#genres").change(function(e) {
   filter();
  });
  
  jQuery("#channels").change(function(e) {
    filter();
  });    
    
    

  function filter(){
	var text    = jQuery("#mainContent .srchBar").val();
	var genre   = jQuery("#genres option:selected").val();
    if(!genre){
      genre  = "none"
    }    
	var channel = jQuery("#channels option:selected").val();
    if(!channel){
      channel  = "none"
    }
	
	jQuery(".posterThumbs li").each(function() {
		var show = jQuery(this).hasClass(genre) || genre == "none";
		show = show && (jQuery(this).hasClass(channel) || channel  == "none");
		show = show && (text == "" || jQuery(this).find("img").attr("alt").search(new RegExp(text, "i")) != -1);
		
		if (show) {
			jQuery(this).addClass("active");
			jQuery(this).removeClass("hidden");
		} else {
			jQuery(this).addClass("hidden");
			jQuery(this).removeClass("active");
		}
	});
    if(jQuery(".posterThumbs li.active").size() == 0) {
      jQuery("h1.noResult").show(); 
	} else {
	  jQuery("h1.noResult").hide();
	}
  }
  
    jQuery(document).ready(function() {  
    var stickyNavTop = jQuery('#filters').offset().top;   
    var stickyNav = function(){  
      var scrollTop = jQuery(window).scrollTop() + 70;  
      //console.log(scrollTop);
      //console.log(stickyNavTop);
      if (scrollTop > stickyNavTop) {   
        jQuery('#filters').addClass('nav-fix');  
      } else {  
        jQuery('#filters').removeClass('nav-fix');   
      }  
    };  
    
    stickyNav();  
    
    jQuery(window).scroll(function() {  
      stickyNav();  
    });  
  });
    
  </script><script type="text/javascript">
  if(/ref=fox/.test(location.search))
  {
    openPopup('#modalGeneric', '', '<img width="651px" height="625px" src="http://cdn.foxplay.com/sites/foxplay-la/files/img/misc/fox-launch.jpg?ver=39aa60a8-247b-458a-80f5-ecac11e81ca0" onclick="jQuery.fn.custombox(\'close\');"/>');
  }
  else if(/ref=fx/.test(location.search))

    openPopup('#modalGeneric', '', '<img width="651px" height="625px" src="http://cdn.foxplay.com/sites/foxplay-la/files/img/misc/fx-launch.jpg?ver=002448a3-7b89-45f3-91e6-c20b4075aaba" onclick="jQuery.fn.custombox(\'close\');"/>');
